name: corn-maze-cad
description: Desktop CAD application for corn maze design

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd app/electron && npm install && cd ../renderer && npm install && cd ../.. && npm run install:python
scripts.dev:electron: wait-on http://localhost:5173 && npm run electron:build && cross-env NODE_ENV=development electron app/electron/dist/main.js
scripts.dev: concurrently -n "Python,React,Electron" -c "green,blue,yellow" "npm run dev:python" "npm run dev:renderer" "npm run dev:electron"
scripts.build: npm run build:renderer && npm run build:electron
